title: Retro Wrestling Legends
description: Step into the squared circle and relive the era of larger-than-life professional wrestling personalities from the golden age!

questions.question: Which wrestler, known as 'The Gorgeous One,' was famous for his bleached blond hair and outrageous robes in the 1940s-50s?
Andre the Giant, billed at 7 feet 4 inches tall, headlined WrestleMania III against which opponent in 1987?
Hulk Hogan's catchphrase instructing fans to live healthily was known as what?
options: Say Your Prayers and Eat Your Vitamins

questions.question: Which wrestling promotion, run by Vince McMahon, expanded from a regional territory to become a national phenomenon in the 1980s?

Which masked wrestler was one of the biggest stars in wrestling history and performed primarily in Mexican lucha libre?
'Rowdy' Roddy Piper hosted which famous interview segment on WWF television in the 1980s?
Which wrestler was known as 'Nature Boy' and used the figure-four leglock as his finishing move?
The 'Macho Man' Randy Savage was known for his distinctive raspy voice and which signature phrase?
Bruno Sammartino held the WWWF (later WWF) Championship for nearly eight years during the 1960s and 70s. He was nicknamed what?
Which tag team duo, known as 'The Wild Samoans,' dominated tag team wrestling in the late 1970s and early 1980s?
Dusty Rhodes, known as 'The American Dream,' was famous for his working-class persona and signature move called the what?
